org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa

Class SplitTree.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.SplitTree.Node
  • Enclosing class:
    SplitTree

    public static class SplitTree.Node
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines nodes in a split tree.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Node(SplitTree.Node p, java.util.Collection<Configuration> cs)
      Constructs this node with a parent node and the corresponding configurations of this node.
